title: The Fight
description: An alternate cover edition can be found here.Pretending she was mine seemed so harmless in the beginning...  When Carrie and Ben's wedding fun comes to an abrupt end, it's anybody's guess what will happen next...  **This new adult romance series contains mature content, adult language, and several characters who also feature in the Tempted Series by Hazel Kelly, namely Will & Ella.
author: Hazel Kelly
